title: Average ticket price New York Knicks ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This graph depicts the Average ticket price for New York Knicks games of the National Basketball Association from 2006/07 to 2015/16 .
In the 2006/07 season , the Average ticket price was 70.51 U.S. dollars .
gold: This graph depicts the average ticket price for New York Knicks games of the National Basketball Association from 2006/07 to 2015/16.
In the 2006/07 season , the average ticket price was 70.51 U.S. dollars.
With an average price of more than 120 U.S. dollars , tickets for New York Knicks games are the most expensive in the league .
